metadata.title: CVE-2024-11706 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference may have inadvertently occurred in `pk12util`,and specifically in the `SEC_ASN1DecodeItem_Util` function, when handlingmalformed or improperly formatted input files. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 133 and Thunderbird < 133.

criterions.comment: mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
